page.title: Oops, something went wrong
page.defaultMessage: An unexpected error has occurred on the platform.
page.supportMessage: If the problem persists, please contact our technical support team with the error code above.

rateLimit.title: Too Many Requests
rateLimit.message: You've made too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
rateLimit.waitMessage: Please wait {seconds} seconds before trying again.
